Keyboard shortcuts for Monday.com

A visual cheat-sheet for the 24 keyboard shortcuts found on Monday.com

Original Reference Report Issue

System

Bolt Switch (quick switch between boards)

  • Ctrl
  • B

Close Item Page

  • Esc

Close Dialogs

  • Esc

Close Search

  • Esc

Board

Navigate Down

  • Down

Navigate Up

  • Up

Navigate Left

  • Left

Navigate Right

  • Right

Navigate to Next Cell

  • Tab

Navigate to Previous Tab

  • Shift
  • Tab

Edit Cell Content

  • Enter

Clear Cell Content

  • Backspace

Open Column View

  • Space

Search Board

  • Ctrl
  • F

Copy Cell Content

  • Ctrl
  • C

Paste Cell Content

  • Ctrl
  • V

Cut Cell Content

  • Ctrl
  • X

Select Item

  • Ctrl
  • Enter

Select Range of Items

  • Shift
  • Enter

Create New Group

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • G

Create New Column

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • C

Open Activity Log

  • Ctrl
  • L

  • Ctrl
  • (click)

  • Ctrl
  • G
